imdb.plot outline: The project is in the late-night show format, famous and popular in the whole world. Within the framework of the program, the hosts receive people known in Armenia and in the world and discuss the noteworthy and important events occurred during the week. The meeting has a non-official format, while the program is full of comedic sketches, musical numbers and many funny and interesting videos. Together with the hosts, the guests participate in entertaining and interactive games. Beloved comedians Aram MP3 and Garik Papoyan are the hosts of the show.
imdb.title: Nice Evening
plot: The project is in the late-night show format, famous and popular in the whole world. Within the framework of the program, the hosts receive people known in Armenia and in the world and discuss the noteworthy and important events occurred during the week. The meeting has a non-official format, while the program is full of comedic sketches, musical numbers and many funny and interesting videos. Together with the hosts, the guests participate in entertaining and interactive games. Beloved comedians Aram MP3 and Garik Papoyan are the hosts of the show.::AMPTV
